a1x a1y a1z a2x a2y a2z at
b1x b1y b1z b2x b2y b2z bt
cx cy cz
dx dy dz
ex ey ez

avx = a2x - a1x
avxt = avx * at
ax = a1x + avxt
avy = a2y - a1y
avyt = avy * at
ay = a1y + avyt
avz = a2z - a1z
avzt = avz * at
az = a1z + avzt

bvx = b2x - b1x
bvxt = bvx * bt
bx = b1x + bvxt
bvy = b2y - b1y
bvyt = bvy * bt
by = b1y + bvyt
bvz = b2z - b1z
bvzt = bvz * bt
bz = b1z + bvzt

aex = ax - ex
aey = ay - ey
aez = az - ez
bex = bx - ex
bey = by - ey
bez = bz - ez
cex = cx - ex
cey = cy - ey
cez = cz - ez
dex = dx - ex
dey = dy - ey
dez = dz - ez

aexbey = aex * bey
bexaey = bex * aey
ab = aexbey - bexaey
bexcey = bex * cey
cexbey = cex * bey
bc = bexcey - cexbey
cexdey = cex * dey
dexcey = dex * cey
cd = cexdey - dexcey
dexaey = dex * aey
aexdey = aex * dey
da = dexaey - aexdey
aexcey = aex * cey
cexaey = cex * aey
ac = aexcey - cexaey
bexdey = bex * dey
dexbey = dex * bey
bd = bexdey - dexbey

abc1 = aez * bc
abc2 = bez * ac
abc3 = cez * ab
abc4 = abc1 + abc3
abc = abc4 - abc2

bcd1 = bez * cd
bcd2 = cez * bd
bcd3 = dez * bc
bcd4 = bcd1 + bcd3
bcd = bcd4 - bcd2

cda1 = cez * da
cda2 = dez * ac
cda3 = aez * cd
cda4 = cda1 + cda3
cda = cda4 + cda2

dab1 = dez * ab
dab2 = aez * bd
dab3 = bez * da
dab4 = dab1 + dab3
dab = dab4 + dab2

al1 = aex * aex
al2 = aey * aey
al3 = aez * aez
al4 = al1 + al2
alift = al4 + al3

bl1 = bex * bex
bl2 = bey * bey
bl3 = bez * bez
bl4 = bl1 + bl2
blift = bl4 + bl3

cl1 = cex * cex
cl2 = cey * cey
cl3 = cez * cez
cl4 = cl1 + cl2
clift = cl4 + cl3

dl1 = dex * dex
dl2 = dey * dey
dl3 = dez * dez
dl4 = dl1 + dl2
dlift = dl4 + dl3

ds1 = dlift * abc
ds2 = clift * dab
dl = ds2 - ds1

dr1 = blift * cda
dr2 = alift * bcd
dr = dr2 - dr1

det = dl + dr
